name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): CS Through the Ages
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): CS Through the Ages
long_desc: The course will pick up an algorithm or system in computer science that gained prominence in every decade since the 1940s, go through the historical and technical details of the algorithm and critically examine its impact and more recent advancements.

custom_fields.goals: The historical context of the algorithms along with the algorithm that CS students learn is an interesting and useful in itself to develop more useful algorithms.
custom_fields.key_topics: The course will pick up an algorithm or system in computer science that gained prominence in every decade since the 1940s, go through the historical and technical details of the algorithm and critically examine it's impact and more recent advancements.
custom_fields.relevance: The historical context of the algorithms CS students learn is interesting and useful in itself to develop more useful algorithms.
